refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a bank of 16 different MIDI control message numbers from a KAWAI MM-16 midi mixer.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Creates a bank of 16 different MIDI control message numbers from a KAWAI MM-16 midi mixer.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: k1, k2, ...., k16 sliderKawai imin1, imax1, init1, ifn1, \ imin2, imax2, init2, ifn2, ..., imin16, imax16, init16, ifn16

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: imin1 ... imin16 -- minimum values for each controller
imax1 ... imax16 -- maximum values for each controller
init1 ... init16 -- initial value for each controller
ifn1 ... ifn16 -- function table for conversion for each controller

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The opcode sliderKawai is equivalent to slider16, but it has the controller and channel numbers (ichan and ictlnum) hard-coded to make for quick compatiblity with the KAWAI MM-16 midi mixer. This device doesn't allow changing the midi message associated to each slider. It can only output on control 7 for each fader on a separate midi channel. This opcode is a quick way of assigning the mixer's 16 faders to k-rate variables in csound.
